~~ three tracks ~~

Abounds in reverbs and delays, as ketchup (and mustard).
These three little gems are Webern-like masterpieces of
sincere exploitation.

The rhythmic crescendo of this trine sequence
has the climax on 3) with the monstrous and profane binary beat.

Enjoy this 3min > piece.

1) Intro-Next

2) Second

3) Dr.Jekyll
